description: Roy Higgins was pulled out of the water after having a cardiac arrest in a Manx swimming pool.
title: Onchan cardiac arrest swimmer, 81, thanks pool 'guardians'
title_page: Onchan cardiac arrest swimmer, 81, thanks pool 'guardians' - BBC News
maintext: Returning to thank those who helped, he said he was "in awe of [all] involved", while lifeguard Pieter De Bruin said it was "very emotional" to see him again.
